channel.title: Juba South Sudan on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Juba South Sudan on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Maps of South Sudan and its capital city of Juba
item.description: Some maps of South Sudan, which is in the news today because of an emerging civil war. UNOCHA South Sudan describes the displaced persons in South Sudan: On 20-21 December (2013), the security situation remained stable but tense in Juba. It is estimated that at least 20,000 people are sheltering at the two main UNMISS bases in town. During assessments in different neighbourhoods of Juba, protection agencies found several areas deserted, and witnessed looting.
